definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: But bleeding-heart arguments don't necessarily tell heads of state to move their money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，出血，心論據並不一定告訴元首將他們的錢。

sentences.english: In the process of translation, we have left behind some of the original data .
sentences.chinese: 在移譯的過程中，我們拋棄了某些原有的論據。

sentences.english: Now he and a colleague have proven it using rigorous mathematical arguments.
sentences.chinese: 現在他和他的同事用嚴謹的數學論據去證明這一猜想。

sentences.english: As I mentioned before, proofs use axioms and theorems to make their case.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，證明以公理和定理做爲其論據。

sentences.english: The main argument relativists appeal to is that of tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 相對主義者主要訴諸的論據是寬容。

sentences.english: He began to gather facts to develop his theory.
sentences.chinese: 他開始收集論據以論證他的理論。

sentences.english: Before giving my opinion, I thellonk it is essential to look at the argument of both sides.
sentences.chinese: 在揭曉我的定見之前，我以爲看兩邊的論據是根本的。

sentences.english: The capacity-building argument carries more weight.
sentences.chinese: 關於能力建設的論據的分量更重。

sentences.english: His speech failed in persuasiveness and proof.
sentences.chinese: 他的講演缺乏說服力和論據。

sentences.english: It was easy to pick holes in his argument.
sentences.chinese: 在他的論據裏挑毛病並不難。

sentences.english: Of course there is some truth to this argument.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這裏有一些論據來支持這個論點。

sentences.english: Have I supported my arguments with documented proof or examples?
sentences.chinese: 我有沒有用文檔性的證據和例子來支持我的論據？

sentences.english: Some scholars hold that the creating method is a false concept and put forward many arguments.
sentences.chinese: 一些學者認爲創作方法是僞概念並提出了諸多論據。

sentences.english: All of this provides a different sort of argument for the preservation of nature.
sentences.chinese: 所有的這些給出的都是保護大自然的另類論據。

sentences.english: Friedman carefully sifts through the other authors' arguments and evidence.
sentences.chinese: 弗裏德曼仔細地從其他作者的論點及論據中做了篩選。

sentences.english: Are there any facts that I need to check?
sentences.chinese: 需不需要覈查論據的真實性？

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
